title: Room in a Shared Flat, Hermitage Road, N4
description: The roomThe room is a warm, south facing double room furnished with a double bed, desk, chest of drawers, wardrobe and large mirror. The flatThe flat is a first and second floor maisonette with a large living room with TV, Sonos, large sofa, coffee table. There is fast 200mb Virgin broadband with unlimited downloads. You’ll have access to a bathroom with a shower, bath and large sink. I use this only occasionally as I have my own upstairs. There is a large open plan kitchen and dining room with lots of cooking equipment, rice cooker, two large fridges, gas hob with wok burner etc. There is a lockable bike shed outside with space for one bike. The areaThe flat is on a quiet residential road 5 minutes walk from Finsbury Park and 10 minutes walk from Manor House Tube Station (Piccadilly Line) and Harringay Green Lanes Overground for access to Hampstead Heath. There are lots of grocery shops, cafes and pubs on Green Lanes, 5 minutes away, including Dusty Knuckle, an excellent bakery and cafe. Finsbury Park has a weekly Park Run on Saturday mornings if you’re keen on running. The flat is a 15 minute walk away from Woodberry Wetlands nature reserve, or for sailing, swimming and climbing at West Reservoir. Stoke Newington and Clissold Park are a short bus ride or 20 minute walk away. There are buses directly into the City and Old Street. The closest cinema is a Picturehouse at Finsbury Park, where there are also more shops and bars/restaurants. About me: I’m 37, a professional, running my own small company working as an agent for Japanese design brands in the UK. I’m looking for a relaxed, clean housemate to share my home with. It’s not a big party flat, but somewhere you can relax and feel at home. I’m interested in music, films, culture, cycling, art. I work from home 2-3 days per week. My neighbours downstairs are very friendly, from New Zealand and Australia. I have a cat, Pickle, who is very friendly and playful, she sleeps in the kitchen at night.Looking for non smokerPrice£800/month - bills not included

title: 1 Bed Flat, Green Lanes, N4
description: This property has just been refurbished and redecorated so has a new kitchen, new bathroom, new boiler and new flooring throughout. The property is located on the second floor ontop of a fish and chip shop and is beside a pharmacy, a supermarket, a hairdressers, a pub, a cafe and there is also a Sainsbury's across the road.  There are four bus stops at walking distance from the property that go in four different directions so is well placed and the nearest underground is Manor House Station.  You can also go for a lovely walk in Clissold park which is also nearby.  The property has one bedroom, a living room, a kitchen/diner and a bathroom.  The electricity works with a key meter and the gas is paid with by bill sent to you.  The council tax and the water bill is included in the monthly rent.

title: Room in a Shared House, Digby Crescent, N4
description: Two rooms in a shared house for rent. It is a brick terraced property in Finsbury Park, near Finsbury Park and Manor House tube lines. There are also good local buses. There is one large sitting room and a bedroom, and there is a very small kitchen and bathroom on the mezzanine floor. At the moment there is only one bathroom in the property (but another toilet and washbasin) so the bathroom would be shared until the additional shower room is added (asap).The rooms are in good decorative order, and are furnished at present, but the tenant could add their own furniture. There is a cat and the access to the top rooms is through the house, so cat lovers preferred.

title: 1 Bed Flat, Woodview Close, N4
description: Spacious one bedroom first floor flat located in a quiet development in the Harringay Green Lanes area. Set behind a security gate within private communal grounds, the property comprises: double bedroom, reception room, bathroom and separate fully-fitted kitchen. The flat comes with a free off-road (and very secure) parking space. Further benefits include all furnishings, new washer/dryer, wooden blinds and double glazing throughout.The wide open spaces of Finsbury Park are only a stone's throw away. Also nearby are the retail outlets of the Arena shopping park and the vibrant district of Green Lanes, with its fantastic selection of eateries, cafés and shops to explore. Manor House underground station on the Piccadilly Line (Zone 2) is within easy walking distance, from which the West End can be reached in less than 20 minutes. London Overground Harringay Green Lanes station is closer still, and numerous bus routes service the area.

title: 1 Bed Flat, Park House, N4
description: The AreaAvailable to rent from 10th April.  Rental price includes property service charge. A one bedroom, newly decorated first  floor flat with lift access.   The whole block has also been refurbished and decorated with new doors, carpet and fire safety works. The property is located in a vibrant and diverse area with an excellent selection of shops, pubs and restaurants overlooking Finsbury Park.  The property is within a few minutes walk of Finsbury Park underground and overground station.  There are also a vast number of bus routes within a couple of minutes walk.  The PropertyThe property makes for the perfect home for a couple.  One double bedroom with 2 large wardrobes with internal drawers and hanging space, chest of drawers and bed.The bathroom is in good condition and has excellent water pressure, an over bath shower, toilet, basin and heated towel rail The  large open plan living space includes a kitchen with ample cupboard space, electric fan oven and hob, extractor, fridge with small integral freezer and washing machine.   In the living area there are an excellent selection of cupboards, dining table and chairs, nest of tables, large leather sofa and a 'Lloyd Loom' style wicker chair.   The property is double glazed and has recently been insulated and the block has had fire safety works to ensure  it meets the current fire regulations. There is an attractive  communal garden area to the front of the property.Main featuresOne double bedroomOne bathroomCommunal garden FurnishedBills ExclusiveClose to public transport and amenitiesFibre Optic Broadband readyApplication ProcessReferences will be required, along with a security deposit equivalent to one month’s rental

title: 1 Bed Flat, Stroud Green Road, N4
description: NO FEES!! GAS AND ELECTRICITY INCLUDED IN THE RENT!!Bright and cosy  studio/1 bed apartment with separate kitchen/living space located only 5 min walk from Finsbury Park Station which comes furnished.The flat compromises of 1 Good Sized Separate Bedroom laminate flooring throughout, Separate Fully Fitted Kitchen/ Living space including white goods i. e. washing machine, good size fridge-freezer, cooker and oven, 1 Separate Shower Room and WC.You will be surrounded by plenty of popular local shops and restaurants in the area.Available from 25.04.2022LEISUREThis property is well-positioned for Camden Town, with popular destinations including Camden Lock and Camden High Street. There is a Tesco Metro a short walk away, and there is also an M&S Simply Food (under a mile away) and a Morrisons supermarket (less than a mile away) within easy reach.If you enjoy visiting the cinema, there is an Odeon cinema less than a mile from the property in Holloway. There is also a Picturehouse cinema approximately a mile from the property in Crouch End and a Cineworld and a Vue cinema approximately 1.8 miles away in Wood Green.TRANSPORTFinsbury Park Underground Station (zone 2) is less than half a mile away, which is served by the Piccadilly and Victoria lines, providing direct services to Heathrow Airport. Arsenal Underground Station (zone 2) is also nearby, which is served by the Jubilee line providing frequent services to Canary Wharf.Railway stations: There are 3 stations within walking distance - Finsbury Park is 0.3 miles away (7 min walk), Crouch Hill is approximately 0.4 miles away (8 min walk) and Harringay is about 0.7 miles away (14 min walk).Motorway Junctions: M1 J1 is 5.2 miles away.Flights: The closest airport is London City Airport (8.3 miles).HEALTHCAREHospitals: There are 3 hospitals within walking distance - Wolfson House is around 0.6 miles away (13 min walk), Moorfields At St Ann's Hospital is about 1.1 miles away (23 min walk) and The Whittington Hospital is 1.2 miles away (25 min walk).Doctors: There are 3 surgeries within walking distance - Stroud Green Medical Clinic is approximately 0.2 miles away (5 min walk), The 157 Medical Practice (Dr H Ramnani) is about 0.2 miles away (5 min walk) and Hanley Primary Care Centre is about 0.5 miles away (10 min walk).

title: Room in a Shared Flat, Myddleton Avenue, N4
description: I’m looking for a single person to move into one of the bedrooms of my two bedroom flat next to the Castle Climbing Centre off Green Lanes.The room is south west facing and has a large window, so it gets sun throughout the day all year round (if it’s sunny!!). The room is fairly large (4.3m x 2.8m) and has an en-suite shower with toilet and wash hand basin. It is offered furnished with a nice double bed with two bedside tables, and an integrated wardrobe in the room, providing ample storage for the occupant.You’ll be sharing with another person in his 40s’. He works for a charity. He is into health and fitness and is always busy working on his projects. He’s a cool dude and easy to get along with. The flat is 5 minutes walk from Clissold Park, about 12 minutes walk from Stoke Newington Church Street.Kitchen includes washing machine, dishwasher, fridge freezer, gas hob and adequate cabinet spaces. The lounge is very large and bright with three large south west facing windows allowing lots of sunlight in the room even in winter days. There is a large table with 6 chairs, a sofa bed, a coffee table and a large bookshelf/tv stand.The flat is on the second floor of a private block of flats within Myddleton grange, 5 minutes walk to Clissold Park, 10 minutes walk to Stoke Newington Church Street. The Brownswood Pub, the local off license as well as the Sainsbury’s Express are all within 2-3 minutes walk yet, once you enter Myddleton Grange, it is as quiet as a village! Everyone in the block are professionals who like their peace and quiet. I will give preference to professionals who also want their home to be quiet and peaceful. Your friends are welcome to visit you however, there mustn’t be late night parties or gatherings that cause nuisance to the neighbours. Any such complaint or incident will result in automatic termination of tenancy. The person must be a non-smoker. No pets are allowed. £825pcm plus 50% of gas, electricity, water, broadband. and council tax bills. £975pcm including gas (fair usage agreed before tenancy commences), electricity, water and council tax bills.Available from 14th May onwards. Viewing possible from 9th May onwards.
